description.para: Make EzStr object enumerator points to the next object in EzStr object set.

tr.td: Function succeeds in moving the cursor to the next element.
EzStr enumerator currently points to the last object.

remarks.para: EzStr object enumerator points before the first element after creating it or calling Reset. Calling Current at this point in time is invalid and will return false. So you should call MoveNext to make EzStr object move forward to the corresponding object and then call Current to get any copy of EzStr object.
If EzStr object enumerator points to the last object of EzStr object set, calling MoveNext will return S_FALSE.

If some modifications are made to EzStr object set (including adding and deleting EzStr object), you should call Reset to reset EzStr object enumerator, otherwise errors will occur while calling Current and MoveNext.

system.system_name: Windows 2000 or later; Elastos 2.0 or later.
